hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the branch for the build

definition.script:
pipeline { agent { node { label 'build_slave' } } environment { APPLICATION_NAME = "CAMPP_UI" NOTIFYUSERS = 'sreem@newtglobalcorp.com,syed.h@newtglobalcorp.com,pranavkorde@newtglobal.com,pankajkumar@newtglobal.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } parameters { string(name: 'branch', defaultValue: 'Barclay_UI', description: 'Enter the branch for the build') } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 1, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Checkout") { steps { deleteDir() echo "Checkout the code" git branch: "${params.branch}", credentialsId: 'newtglobaladmin', url: 'https://github.com/newtglobalgit/barclayspoc3ui.git' } } stage ("Sonar_Analysis") { steps{ echo "Sonar Analysis has started" sh "sonar-scanner \ -Dsonar.projectKey=camp_UI \ -Dsonar.projectName=camp_UI \ -Dsonar.sources=. \ -Dsonar.host.url=http://192.168.2.21:9000/sonarqube \ -Dsonar.login=25534cb4ff60d377ca72aefd244d70eff8bfcf56" } } stage ("Build") { steps { echo "Building the code" sh "npm install" sh "ng build --prod" sh "npm run build:prod" } } stage ("Nexus Upload"){ steps { echo "Deploy Artifacts to Nexus" sh "cd dist; tar -zcvf CAMPP.tar CAMPP/" nexusPublisher nexusInstanceId: 'nexus', nexusRepositoryId: 'camp_UI', packages: [[$class: 'MavenPackage', mavenAssetList: [[classifier: '', extension: '', filePath: 'dist/CAMPP.tar']], mavenCoordinate: [artifactId: 'CAMPP', groupId: 'com.campp', packaging: 'tar', version: '1.0']]] } } stage ("Deployment to server"){ steps { echo "Deploy Artifacts to server" sshagent(['deployment_ssh_key']) { sh "ssh root@3.133.35.8 /opt/apache-tomcat-9.0.34/bin/shutdown.sh" sh "ssh root@3.133.35.8 rm -rf /opt/apache-tomcat-9.0.34/webapps/CAMPP" sh "scp -r dist/CAMPP.tar root@3.133.35.8:/opt/apache-tomcat-9.0.34/webapps/" sh 'ssh root@3.133.35.8 "cd /opt/apache-tomcat-9.0.34/webapps/; tar -xvf CAMPP.tar; rm -rf /opt/apache-tomcat-9.0.34/webapps/CAMPP.tar"' sh "ssh root@3.133.35.8 /opt/apache-tomcat-9.0.34/bin/startup.sh" } } } } post { always { emailext subject: "Jenkins Job Report For ${APPLICATION_NAME} - ${currentBuild.currentResult}", body: "BUILD DETAILS: ${BUILD_DETAILS}
BUILD STATUS: ${currentBuild.currentResult}", to: "${NOTIFYUSERS}" } }}
